price: 36. En Farao zei: “O Heman! Bouw voor mij een toren zodat ik op de wegen kan aankomen,-
arabic: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ يَٰهَٰمَٰنُ ٱبۡنِ لِي صَرۡحٗا لَّعَلِّيٓ أَبۡلُغُ ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: waqāla fir'ʿawnu yāhāmānu ib'ni lī ṣarḥan laʿallī ablughu al-asbāba
